General.Name: Sundiro Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Sundiro Holding Co., Ltd. operates in the coal industry in China and internationally. It is involved in coal mining; offers coal chemical products; house leasing; and beef food business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: China Life Financial Center, Shanghai, China, 200120

3.Name: Mr. Chunyu  Ren
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
